CONCLUSION: Preliminary objections dismissed (ratione temporis, ratione loci, victim, non-exhaustion of domestic remedies);Violation of Art. 8;Violation of P1-1;Not necessary to examine Art. 13;Just satisfaction reserved;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant is a NORP national of NORP - Cypriot origin , born in DATE and living in GPE .

CARDINAL . The applicant states that he is the registered owner of a plot of land ( Registration number : CARDINAL , ORG : CARDINAL E , ORG ) situated on the sea front in the district of GPE in northern GPE . He also maintains that he is the owner of a QUANTITY house , which he built on the above - mentioned plot of land . He submits that the house was fully furnished and equipped and that it was used by him and his family on a regular basis not only for DATE and holiday purposes but also as a home .

CARDINAL . NORP The applicant states that since DATE he has been prevented by the NORP armed forces from having access to his property , using and enjoying possession of it as well as developing it . In addition , he claims that according to evidence his home is currently occupied by officers and/or other members of the NORP armed forces .
CARDINAL . On DATE the “ ORG of GPE ” enacted LAW within ORG ” , which entered into force on DATE .
